chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_35
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
bout the importance of early detection of pregnancy, antenatal care and 
its essential components including:
 ∙ Calculation of expected pregnancies 
 ∙ Schedule of antenatal assessment
 ∙ History taking for pregnant mothers
 ∙ Physical Examination, General Examination and Abdominal Examination
 ∙ ANC related Investigations– Urine test for pregnancy, Haemoglobin Test, Urine test for proteins and sugar,Oral 
Glucose Tolerance Test (OGTT),RDT for Malaria, HIV, Dengue, HBsAg, and RDT for Syphilis et
